author: Ted
content:
Is this off on the left column somewhere so that everyone who comes from now on can find or rediscover with ease? It is wonderful in its charm, manners, elegance... and the book is nice as well ðŸ™‚

My favorite of all? Page 25. But as a sense of place it is without favorites... it is a narrative that demands respect in its totality. Thanks for making this possible.

Ted
